Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state C,$P_{C}=2atm$ and $V_{C}=40L$
Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state A,$P_{A}=4atm$ and $V_{A}=10L$
According to the ideal gas equation of state $ rac{P_{A}V_{A}}{T_{A}}= rac{P_{C}V_{C}}{T_{C}}$, $T_{C}=600K$ can be obtained
